decks.notes: The main focus of this Jeskai Control deck is to maintain control over the game through a combination of powerful spells and creatures. With a mix of removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Wrath of the Skies, along with powerful creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, the deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional control options, while cards like Ephemerate and Quantum Riddler offer card advantage and utility. The deck also features a variety of lands to support its color requirements and ensure consistent mana production.

The deck focuses on utilizing low-cost, efficient spells and creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By combining burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game. Additionally, cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help to filter through the deck, ensuring a consistent flow of threats. The inclusion of cards like Surgical Extraction also allows for disruption of the opponent's game plan, creating opportunities for the aggro strategy to succeed.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. It focuses on utilizing efficient threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu to apply pressure early in the game. The deck also includes cards like Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding to control the board and protect its creatures. With a mix of versatile creatures and removal spells, it seeks to maintain board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Teferi, Time Raveler provide additional utility and disruption to give the deck more flexibility in various matchups.

The deck focuses on generating mana efficiently with cards like Ruby Medallion and rituals, while utilizing the draw power of Ral, Monsoon Mage and Reckless Impulse. By casting spells for reduced costs and drawing through the deck with Past in Flames and Glimpse the Impossible, the deck aims to combo off and win the game with a big Grapeshot or utilizing Wish for additional resources. The deck also includes some land manipulation with Gemstone Caverns and Valakut Awakening to further optimize its strategy.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using various spells and creatures to slow down the opponent's strategy. It includes powerful control cards like Force of Negation and Leyline Binding, along with creatures such as Elesh Norn and Magmatic Hellkite. The deck also utilizes cards like Birthing Ritual and Quantum Riddler to generate mana and draw cards, enabling more control options. With a combination of removal spells and powerful creatures, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure victory through careful manipulation of the game state.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Faithful Mending. It also utilizes control elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to secure victory by combining explosive reanimation plays with efficient removal and card draw to maintain tempo and out-value the opponent in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory. The deck also aims to control the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Solitude. Quantum Riddler and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide card advantage and resilience, while Ephemerate helps to protect key creatures. The deck utilizes a mix of lands to ensure consistency and mana fixing, while Arena of Glory provides additional value in the late game.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to aggressively deal damage to the opponent using cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Lightning Bolt. The deck also includes cards like Mishra's Bauble and Slickshot Show-Off to control the opponent's hand and board state. The deck utilizes a mix of fast mana sources like Steam Vents and Scalding Tarn to quickly deploy threats and maintain pressure on the opponent. Surgical Extraction and Violent Urge provide versatile answers to opposing strategies, while cards like Preordain and Expressive Iteration help to smooth out draws and find key pieces for the deck's game plan.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently while utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor and Primeval Titan to create a powerful combo that can search for and play multiple lands in a single turn. The goal is to reach a critical mass of lands to cast Scapeshift, which will allow the player to search for and put a large number of lands onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes utility lands like Urza's Saga and Tolaria West to further support the combo strategy.

The deck focuses on using ramp spells like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to quickly generate mana and play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Sire of Seven Deaths. It also includes control elements like Chalice of the Void and Kozilek's Return to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats while also having ways to control the board and protect itself. The key strategy is to ramp into Eldrazi creatures ahead of schedule and close out the game quickly before the opponent can respond effectively.

The deck focuses on fast and aggressive play, utilizing efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to control the board and protect your creatures. Additionally, cards like Arena of Glory and Elegant Parlor give the deck additional support and flexibility in different matchups. The inclusion of Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury adds a powerful finisher to close out games quickly. The deck aims to outpace the opponent and maintain pressure throughout the game.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively while disrupting your opponent's strategy with cards like Solitude and Phelia. Ragavan, Quantum Riddler, and Phlage provide early pressure, while Teferi, Time Raveler helps control the game tempo. The deck also utilizes powerful removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Galvanic Discharge to clear the way for your creatures. Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Consign to Memory offer additional card advantage and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents early and disrupt their game plan to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly generate mana using cards like Birthing Ritual and Misty Rainforest to cast high-impact creatures and spells like Abhorrent Oculus and Flare of Denial. The deck focuses on using a combination of aggressive creatures like Ice-Fang Coatl and Shardless Agent, along with disruptive countermagic like Subtlety and Force of Negation, to apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the game. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and control elements to secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on aggressive creatures and efficient removal to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes a mix of powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Territorial Kavu, alongside versatile spells like Teferi, Time Raveler and Lightning Bolt. The mana base allows for flexibility in casting spells of different colors, while Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support for the aggressive game plan. Consign to Memory and Arena of Glory offer ways to deal with threats and protect key creatures, allowing for a fast and dominant playstyle.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient threats. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury along with disruptive spells like Solitude and Prismatic Ending to control the board and keep the opponent on the back foot. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's resources and game plan while quickly closing out the game with its aggressive creatures.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Utilizing powerful cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer, the deck aims to establish a fast clock and pressure the opponent early on. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and utility, while cards like Blood Moon can disrupt the opponent's mana base. Overall, the deck's key strategy is to maintain a relentless assault and finish off the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.
